helpTexts.li: Move the camera by clicking and dragging the MIDDLE MOUSE BUTTON or with the WASD keys.
To rescue a wounded colonist, select a healthy colonist and the right-click on the wounded one.
An enemy has been incapacitated. You can capture them!
To capture, select a colonist, right-click on the incapacitated enemy, and select Capture.\n\nYou'll need an extra bed marked for prisoner use.
You can talk to people with ? over their heads.\n\nSelect a colonist and right-click on the character with ? attached to his head.
To control colonists directly for combat, Draft them by selecting them and hitting the DRAFT button.

A drafted colonist will do only what you tell them, and can only take combat actions. Those with weapons will use them when possible.\n\nDon't leave colonists Drafted forever - they'll starve and become unhappy.
Manhunting animals generally won't attack doors or inactive turrets.\n\nYou can escape them by getting inside or behind a wall. But they'll wait for you.
To make colonists work at a table, select the table and open the Bills tab. Here, you can say what meals to cook, what things to craft, what creatures to butcher.
To entertain sick people in bed, set up a TV they can watch.
You can assign a tame animal to be trained in specific skills on its TRAINING tab.\n\nAnimals can't be trained continuously; they need time between training sessions.
In the storage tab of a stockpile, you can expand categories to allow or deny specific items. Click the triangles to the left of category names.
You can designate where to mine by opening the ARCHITECT menu and selecting the ORDERS tab.\n\nSome mineable blocks yield STEEL, GOLD, PLASTEEL, and other useful materials.
You can configure how colonists should automatically respond to threats like predatory animals.\n\nChoose from FLEE, ATTACK, and IGNORE modes in the ASSIGN menu.
To communicate, select a colonist and right-click on the comms console.
Items left outdoors will slowly deteriorate.\n\nIf you want to store items long-term, keep them under a roof.
You can inspect the impressiveness, wealth, and beauty of individual rooms using the ROOM STATS INSPECT toggle in the bottom right.
You can click on the notifications in the top-left of the screen to instantly center the camera on their subject.
